questions.question: Among the butane conformers, when viewed about C 2 -C 3 bond, which occur at energy minima on a graph of potential energy versus dihedral angle?

explanations.a: Gauche conformers will have higher energy than anti conformer.
explanations.b: Anti conformers have both CH3 groups farthest apart and hence has lowest energy.
explanations.c: Syn conformers have the most close CH3 groups and this will lead to highest energy peaks.
explanations.d: Only the anti conformer has the lowest energy.

questions.question: The correct statement regarding conformation in butane is:

answers.a: The two gauche forms, when viewed about C 2 - C 3 bond, are enantiomer
answers.b: There is greater barrier to rotation about C 1 — C 2 bond than to C 2 - C 3 bond
answers.c: Its gauche form has higher energy than an eclipsed form when CH 3 — and 'H' are eclipsing
answers.d: In the most stable conformer, dihedral angle between hydrogen atoms is only 90°

explanations.a: The two gauche forms are mirror images of each other but are non superimposable.
explanations.b: The C1-C2 bond will have a lower barrier to rotation as only H atoms will be present on C1 to interact with the CH2CH3 atoms on C2.
explanations.c: Gauche form does not have higher form than any of the eclipsed forms.
explanations.d: In the most stable anti conformer, H atoms make an angle of 60°

questions.question: Select the correct statement concerning conformers of ethane and hexachloroethane:

answers.a: Both have different same number of important conformers
answers.b: Potential energy versus dihedral angle curves have similar nature in both cases
answers.c: Least stable conformer is hexachloroethane is most polar
answers.d: In potential energy versus dihedral angle diagram, there is greater difference between maxima and minima in ethane than in hexachloroethane

explanations.a: Both will have the same nature of important conformer as all H are now replaced by Cl.
explanations.b: Since all H atoms are changed at the same time, the nature of the curves will remain the same.
explanations.c: None of the conformers in will be polar.
explanations.d: The energy difference between maxima and minima will be greater for hexachloroethane than ethane as the larger Chlorine atoms will interact more among themselves than smaller H atoms.

questions.question: Consider the potential energy diagram for rotation about the C2-C3 bond in pentane.The position marked A most likely corresponds to which of the following newmann projections.

explanations.a: The structure has 6 C atoms and hence is not of pentane.
explanations.b: The eclipsed conformer of CH2CH3 and H will form the second most high energy structures and will correspond to A.
explanations.c: Anti conformer will correspond to the lowest energy structure.
explanations.d: Gauche conformer will correspond to intermediate structures.

questions.question: The most stable configuration of n-butane will be

explanations.a: Skew boat conformation is the same as gauche conformation and will have the dihedral angle of 60 between the CH3 groups.
explanations.b: Eclipsed conformer will have dihedral angle of 0 between the CH3 groups leading to maximum energy.
explanations.c: Gauche will have dihedral angle of 60 between the CH3 groups.
explanations.d: Staggered - anti has dihedral angle of 180 between the CH3 groups and will be most stable.
